thread.title: Frisky couple caught on CCTV having sex at Domino's pizza counter as bemused staff try to take their order - Mirror Online
thread.title_full: Frisky couple caught on CCTV having sex at Domino's pizza counter as bemused staff try to take their order - Mirror Online

author: Kelly-Ann Mills
title: Frisky couple caught on CCTV having sex at Domino's pizza counter as bemused staff try to take their order - Mirror Online
text:
News Frisky couple caught on CCTV having sex at Domino's pizza counter as bemused staff try to take their order A woman claiming to be the video's star says 'we've all done it' and 'you're boring if you haven't' before claiming staff at takeaway "just laughed and told us to behave" Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Couple caught getting amorous at pizza shop counter Share this video Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
An amorous couple have been caught on camera having sex while ordering a pizza at a Domino's take away. 
The footage shared online first shows the woman on her knees in front of the Leeds United supporter, before cutting to a few minutes later when the brazen pair are stood together at the counter. 
In the clip, believed to have been filmed in the the fast-food store in Scarborough, North Yorkshire, shows the staff trying to take their order. 
The footage shows the football fan shielding himself from the camera, with the woman out of shot on her knees allegedly performing a sex act on him. The pair were frisky while ordering (Photo: Ross Parry/Twitter) 
The CCTV surfaced on Twitter after it was captured on Saturday night in the Castle Road eatery following Leeds United's 1-0 win over Yorkshire rivals Sheffield Wednesday. Read More Savage mugger cuts two fingers off woman's hand in violent bid to snatch her iPhone 
Asked about the incident, a spokesman for the Domino's shop said: "We can't comment on something like that - it's a no comment from us." 
According to the Sun , a woman claiming to be the one starring in the film, later commented and did not mind that the film had been shared. Take-away staff told them to behave (Photo: Ross Parry/Twitter) 
She wrote: "If your trying to tell me ya 'av never got a bit frisky in a random or public place then ya f***ing boring haha (sic)." Read More Naked couple spotted having sex in the sea as beach goers look on in open-mouthed horror 
"Everyone’s been ringing us thinking we would be mortified we both just laughed worse things happening in the world than him getting blown off in domino's hahaha (sic).” 
She later added: "Rule number 1 never waste ya boyfriends b***r and always opt for stuffed crust (sic)." 
The woman claimed staff at the takeaway "just laughed and told us to behave". Like us on Facebook
